column1: AI is being used to detect and model non-linear and high-dimensional relationships between genetic variants and environmental factors, helping researchers understand how specific genes and exposures contribute to disease. https://eds.p.ebscohost.com/eds/pdfviewer/pdfviewer?vid=0&sid=8b4fd33d-2bf1-4609-b1e9-19b65cbe1248%40redis
